summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 46th Avenue South, from Kenyon Street, to Henderson Street, by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7855 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
